raw_comment:
I notice that certain areas of the world are more depressed/ less confident than others.
I wonder why certain countries are happy about the world.
This relates to my community since the U.S. is very positive about the world, or at least most of the time.
Headline-" Country Happiness"
ace_sentences: I notice that some areas of the world are more depressed than other areas.
I notice that some areas of the world are less confident than other areas.
I wonder why some countries are happy about the world.
The U.S. is very positive about the world most of the time.
